hint: Push filters early into CTEs, convert comma joins to explicit joins, and pre-filter dimension tables before the main joins to reduce data volume.
Restructure using CTEs to isolate date and dimension filters, then materialize the filtered fact table to optimize the correlated subquery and main join.
Materialize all filtered dimension and fact tables in separate CTEs, then rewrite the self-join subquery to compute the average aggregation once.
Decouple the correlated subquery by computing the average in a separate CTE, then use a structural transform (like a lateral join or window function) to compare individual returns.
